N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4006.8 - Safety vests

State Regulations
(a) Every person
mounted on horseback on the grounds of a racetrack shall wear a properly
fastened safety vest. (b) Each
safety vest shall weigh no more than four pounds and provide a minimum level of
shock absorbing protection to the upper body as evidenced by a label indicating
compliance with one or more of the following product standards or with a
standard that in the judgment of the executive director of the commission or
his or her designee is comparable or superior: (1)

British Equestrian Trade Association
(BETA) Standard f or Body and Shoulder Protectors for Equestrian Use, BETA 2009

Level 1; (2)

European Norm, EN
13158:2009 Level 1, Protective Clothing for equestrian use; or
(3)

American Society for Testing and

Materials, ASTM F2681-08 or F1937-04, Standard Specification for Body

Protectors Used i n Horse Sports and Horseback Riding. (c) A safety vest shall not be altered from
its original manufactured design nor shall the product marking be removed or
defaced. Notes
